body:
i think there's still a problem (sorry) :/

follow up posts to the original msg submitted via email (liam@stask.net) are not showing up in the web ui (though I am receiving other posts to the list on that address).

posting via the web ui results in an initial successful response, and then the message shows up as `deleted` in the [discussion thread](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/golang-nuts/SYPHeKP84X4) (my two attempts show as deleted there for me).

any suggestions? maybe `lstask@gmail.com` also needs to be unbanned, since that address is also associated with my google account?
